_meanings:
{@--3@} Characteristic
difference, peculiar mark, special 

property, speciality, differentia; <ab>oft.</ab>
in <ab>comp.</ab> and translated by ‘special’
‘peculiar’ &c.; <ls>Ś. 6. 5.</ls>

{@--4@} A
favourable turn or crisis in sickness,
a change for the better; {#asti me#}
{#viSezaH#} <ls>Ś. 3</ls> ‘I feel better’.

{@--9@} A
peculiar attribute, the eternal 
distinguishing nature of each of the
nine {%dravyas%}; {#ayamasmAd vyAvftta iti#}
{#vyAvfttibudDimAtrahaMturviSezaH#} <ls>Tarka K.</ls>
(these viśeshas are said to inhere in
the atoms of the Earth, Water,
Lignt, and Air and the five eternal
substances, Ether, Time, Space, Soul
and Mind.).

{@--12@} A mark on the forehead
with sandal, saffron &c.

{@--13@} A
word which limits or qualifies the
sense of another; see {#viSezaRa#}.

a special
supplementary rule, special 
extended application.
